verses.text: And \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* against \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* because \w of|strong="H0182"\w* the \w Ethiopian|strong="H3571"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* whom he had \w married|strong="H3947"\w*: for he had \w married|strong="H3947"\w* an \w Ethiopian|strong="H3571"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*.\f + \fr 12.1 \ft Ethiopian: or, Cushite\f*\f + \fr 12.1 \ft married: Heb. taken\f*

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* indeed \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* only by \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*? hath he not \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* also by us? And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*.

(Now the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \add was\add* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w meek|strong="H6035"\w*, above all the \w men|strong="H0120"\w* which \add were\add* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.)

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and unto \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w*, Come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* ye \w three|strong="H7969"\w* unto the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*. And they \w three|strong="H7969"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* in the \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \add in\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w*: and they \w both|strong="H8147"\w* came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* now my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: If there be a \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* among you, \add I\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will make myself \w known|strong="H3045"\w* unto him in a \w vision|strong="H4759"\w*, \add and\add* will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto him in a \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*.
My \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \add is\add* not so, who \add is\add* \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* in all mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

With him will I \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* to \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, even \w apparently|strong="H4758"\w*, and not in dark \w speeches|strong="H2420"\w*; and the \w similitude|strong="H8544"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall he \w behold|strong="H5027"\w*: wherefore then were ye not \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* against my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*?
And the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against them; and he \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*.

And the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* from off the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*; and, behold, \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* \add became\add* \w leprous|strong="H6879"\w*, \add white\add* as \w snow|strong="H7950"\w*: and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* upon \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w*, and, behold, \add she was\add* \w leprous|strong="H6879"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Alas|strong="H0994"\w*, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, I beseech thee, \w lay|strong="H7896"\w* not the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* upon us, wherein we have done \w foolishly|strong="H2973"\w*, and wherein we have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*.

Let her not be as one \w dead|strong="H4994"\w*, of whom the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* is \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* when he cometh \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Heal|strong="H7495"\w* her now, O \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, I beseech thee.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, If her \w father|strong="H0001"\w* had \w but|strong="H3417"\w* \w spit|strong="H3417"\w* in her \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, should she not be \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*? let her be \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* from the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that let her be \w received|strong="H0622"\w* in \add again\add*.

And \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* was \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* from the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* not till \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* was \w brought|strong="H0622"\w* in \add again\add*.

And \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w removed|strong="H5265"\w* from \w Hazeroth|strong="H2698"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w*.
